meanings.definition: A type of flour made from ground toasted maize.
meanings.sent1: I bought some pinole to make delicious tortillas.
meanings.sent2: The pinole was used to thicken the sauce for the stew.
meanings.sent3: The pinole flour spilled all over the kitchen, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: Her baking skills were as fine as pinole, creating the most delightful treats.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked pinole filled the house, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A type of porridge made from ground toasted maize.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, she enjoyed a warm bowl of pinole for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The children loved the sweet taste of pinole porridge.
meanings.sent3: He pretended the pinole porridge was a magic potion that gave him superpowers.
meanings.sent4: The pinole porridge was a comforting hug in a bowl on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The pinole porridge bubbled on the stove, filling the kitchen with a cozy scent.

meanings.definition: A type of beverage made from ground toasted maize.
meanings.sent1: The refreshing pinole drink quenched their thirst after a long hike.
meanings.sent2: At the festival, they served traditional pinole beverages in colorful cups.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled the pinole drink on her shirt, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: The pinole beverage was a golden elixir that brought joy to all who tasted it.
meanings.sent5: The sun set as they sipped on the sweet pinole drink, enjoying the peaceful moment.
